summary.span: 命名空间包含的接口和结构为单独更新的组件之间的通信提供了基础。

span.span: The namespace contains interfaces and structures that provide the basis for communication between components that are updated independently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间定义一组接口和更新的组件，如应用程序和外接程序进行通信，可以通过单独使用的结构。The namespace defines a set of interfaces and structures that can be used by independently updated components, such as an application and an add-in, to communicate. 组件可以使用的接口和中的结构命名空间中用于跨进程进行通信或应用程序域边界或与中的相同进程或应用程序域的其他组件进行通信。Components can use the interfaces and structures in the namespace to communicate across process or application domain boundaries, or to communicate with other components in the same process or application domain. 中的接口命名空间也称为协定。The interfaces in the namespace are also called contracts. 所有协定都派生自接口。All contracts derive from the interface. 目的，使用.NET Framework 创建的组件充当就类似于目的，`IUnknown`接口用于创建使用 com。 组件The purpose that serves for components created using the .NET Framework is similar to the purpose that the `IUnknown` interface serves for components created using COM. 若要确定对象是否实现特定的约定，组件使用方法。To determine whether an object implements a particular contract, components use the method. 和命名空间包含补充的其他协定命名空间。The and namespaces contain additional contracts that supplement the namespace. 命名空间包含组件用于访问类型信息和调用类型成员的协定。The namespace contains contracts that components use to access type information and invoke type members. 命名空间包含定义的集合的协定和对象。The namespace contains contracts that define collections of and objects.
